title: Workshop on Developing AI-Utilized Language Instructional Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Language Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening language instructional design competencies using AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT) in a digital device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners can design topic mind maps for language subjects with 80% accuracy using AI tools
Learners can present four or more criteria for verifying the reliability of AI-generated content
Learners can develop a three-stage formative assessment tool using AI-generated materials in a blended environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
